title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Aug 4 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Aug 4 2022
description:
NYC Mayor Eric Adams discovers his fellow Democrats ruined the criminal justice system, sounds like he listens to C&B. Buck says, "You don't have to take my word for it, although you should. The mayor of New York, Eric Adams, is laying it out for everybody. He said the criminal justice system is insane." WNBA player Brittney Griner sentenced to 9 years in Russian jail on drug charge. Buck takes calls on Brittney Griner, finds no sympathy for Griner.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
